options.content:
# Tesla Vehicle Status
Real-time vehicle data from Tessie API. Select a vehicle from the dropdown above.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tesla_vehicle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "battery_level")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tesla_vehicle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "battery_range")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tesla_vehicle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "charging_state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tesla_vehicle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tesla_vehicle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "charger_power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tesla_vehicle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "charge_amps")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tesla_vehicle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "charge_energy_added")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tesla_vehicle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "time_to_full_charge")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tesla_vehicle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "charge_limit_soc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tesla_vehicle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "inside_temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if "${temp_unit}" == "F" then r._value * 9.0/5.0 + 32.0 else r._value}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

panels.title: Inside Temp (${temp_unit:text})
panels.description: Interior temperature from vehicle sensors. Shows cached data when car is asleep.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tesla_vehicle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "outside_temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if "${temp_unit}" == "F" then r._value * 9.0/5.0 + 32.0 else r._value}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

panels.title: Outside Temp (${temp_unit:text})
panels.description: Exterior temperature from vehicle sensors. Shows cached data when car is asleep.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tesla_vehicle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "car_version")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tesla_vehicle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "odometer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tesla_vehicle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "battery_level")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "display_name"])

from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tesla_vehicle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "charger_power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "display_name"])

from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tesla_vehicle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "battery_range")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "display_name"])

from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tesla_vehicle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "inside_temp" or r._field == "outside_temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if "${temp_unit}" == "F" then r._value * 9.0/5.0 + 32.0 else r._value}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])

from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tesla_vehicle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "is_connected")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if r._value then 1 else 0}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tesla_vehicle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "is_preconditioning")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if r._value then 1 else 0}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tesla_vehicle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "battery_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if r._value then 1 else 0}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tesla_vehicle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "fast_charger_present")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if r._value then 1 else 0}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tesla_vehicle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "conn_charge_cable")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tesla_vehicle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "charge_amps")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tesla_vehicle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "charger_voltage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "fleet_charge_session")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "energy_kwh")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.vehicle_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.vehicle_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

panels.title: Last Session Energy
panels.description: Energy delivered in the most recent charging session (from Fleet API)

targets.query:
from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "fleet_charge_session")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "duration_min")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.vehicle_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.vehicle_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

panels.title: Last Session Duration
panels.description: Duration of the most recent charging session

targets.query:
from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "fleet_charge_session")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "avg_power_kw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.vehicle_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.vehicle_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

panels.title: Last Session Avg Power
panels.description: Average power during the most recent charging session

targets.query:
from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "fleet_charge_session")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "energy_kwh")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.vehicle_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.vehicle_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> count()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

panels.title: Sessions (7 Days)
panels.description: Number of charging sessions in the last 7 days

targets.query:
from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "fleet_charge_session")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "energy_kwh")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.vehicle_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.vehicle_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

panels.title: Energy (7 Days)
panels.description: Total energy delivered in the last 7 days

targets.query:
from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "fleet_charge_session")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "energy_kwh")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.vehicle_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.vehicle_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

panels.title: Session Energy
panels.description: Energy per charging session over time

targets.query:
from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "tesla_session")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "charger_type", "energy_added_kwh", "duration_min", "starting_battery_level", "ending_battery_level", "soc_gained", "peak_power_kw"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 20)

panels.title: Recent Vehicle Charging Sessions
panels.description: Charging sessions tracked from the vehicle's perspective
DRY-RUN: Actions logged but not sent to vehicle. LIVE: Actions sent to vehicle.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "smart_charging_state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "control_enabled")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if r._value then 1 else 0}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

panels.title: Mode

panels.description: Current smart charging status. would_pause = DRY-RUN detected price spike but did not send command.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "smart_charging_state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

panels.title: Smart Charging Status

panels.description: Where current price falls in the 30-day distribution

targets.query:
from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "smart_charging_state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "current_percentile")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

panels.title: Price Percentile

targets.query:
from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "comed_price")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "price_cents_kwh")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.price_type == "5min")
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

panels.description: Price threshold for stopping charging (90th percentile)

targets.query:
from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "smart_charging_state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "stop_threshold_cents")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

panels.title: Stop Threshold (90th %ile)

panels.description: Price threshold for resuming charging (75th percentile)

targets.query:
from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "smart_charging_state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "resume_threshold_cents")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

panels.title: Resume Threshold (75th %ile)

panels.description: Days of price history used for statistics calculation

targets.query:
from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "smart_charging_state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "days_of_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

panels.title: Price History (Days)

targets.query:
from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "smart_charging_actions")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.display_name =~ /${vehicle:regex}/)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time", "action"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({Time: r._time, Action: r.action, Percentile: r.percentile, Price: r.price_cents, Threshold: r.threshold_cents}))
  |> sort(columns: ["Time"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 20)
